title: Improved Xaml Text Formatting Options
body: It would be nice if Runs / Spans inside a Richtextblock / Textblock could support more formatting properties like CSS - i.e. setting background color or a word, putting a border around a word, strikethrough, etc. Currently it's difficult to do some of these things. Nesting UIContainers inside of a RichTextBlock to add border elements needed for this ruins the alignment of text.
